item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Douglas Hofstadter on Lisp (1983) (63 points | 1 comment)
2. FTC Announces "Click-to-Cancel" Rule Making It Easier to Cancel Subscriptions (258 points | 99 comments)
3. Show HN: Graphite, a Blender-inspired 2D procedural design Rust app (630 points | 86 comments)
4. Floss/fund: $1M per year for free and open source projects (247 points | 54 comments)
5. Sqlite3 WebAssembly (582 points | 166 comments)
6. Amazon refreshes its monochrome Kindle lineup, including a bigger Paperwhite (20 points | 4 comments)
7. CapibaraZero: A cheap alternative to FlipperZero based on ESP32-S3 (310 points | 69 comments)
8. Hell Freezes over as AMD and Intel Come Together for x86 – ServeTheHome (44 points | 30 comments)
9. Redbox left PII on decommissioned machines (208 points | 92 comments)
10. MacOS sometimes leaks traffic after system updates (285 points | 134 comments)
11. Show HN: I built the most over-engineered Deal With It emoji generator (735 points | 142 comments)
12. The C23 edition of Modern C (467 points | 279 comments)
13. Eye Contact Correction: Redirecting the eyes to look at the camera (118 points | 127 comments)
14. Show HN: I 3D scanned the tunnels inside the Maya Pyramid Temples at Copan (392 points | 75 comments)
15. Asterinas: OS kernel written in Rust and providing Linux-compatible ABI (304 points | 166 comments)
16. Traveling with Apple Vision Pro (107 points | 131 comments)
17. Supercharge the One Person Framework with SQLite (7 points | 1 comment)
18. Why don't we use awnings anymore (2022) (267 points | 233 comments)
19. Damas-Hindley-Milner inference two ways (93 points | 5 comments)
20. The Internet Archive is back online (219 points | 62 comments)
21. Show HN: Pumpkin – A Modern Minecraft server written in Rust (376 points | 140 comments)
22. Apple introduces iPad mini built for Apple Intelligence (294 points | 436 comments)
23. Mothbox 4.0 (245 points | 37 comments)
24. How ham radio endures (101 points | 39 comments)
25. Show HN: FTWA – Turn any website into an app (121 points | 39 comments)
26. Cofounder Mode: My tactical guide to finding a cofounder (115 points | 54 comments)
27. Life expectancy rise in rich countries slows down: took 30 years to prove (176 points | 358 comments)
28. Show HN: Mermaid ASCII Diagrams (211 points | 43 comments)
29. Australian coal plant in 'extraordinary' survival experiment (86 points | 126 comments)
30. Show HN: A Markdown-based alternative to package.json scripts and makefiles (105 points | 47 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
